articles.title: Explained: The Juice Mission to Explore Jupiter's Moons – The Wire Science - The Wire Science
articles.description: According to the European Space Agency, one of the mission's goals is to explore if the moons Ganymede, Europa or Callisto can be characterised "as both planetary objects and possible habitats".
articles.content:
The European Space Agency’s Juice lifted off on an Ariane 5 rocket from a port in French Guiana on 14 April. Photo: Twitter/@ESA
